solution.linktext: Discovering Windows Internet Explorer Developer Tools
If you are unable to find what you are looking for, check out the MSDN forum for additional assistance

level.title: Submit an incident
level.description: When you submit an incident online, a technical support representative will contact you within one business day.

level.title: Call a technical support representative
level.description: Speak with a technical support representative about your Microsoft product issue.

numbers.number: 1-800-102-1100 (toll free from Airtel land line and mobile phones)
